chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)

Premises:
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
List.tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
ad = BinNums.N : Set
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Env.hd : forall D : Type, Env.Env D -> D
preDTA = Map state : Set
conservation_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list (tcons hd tl) d ls) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
conservation_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list tl d la) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
taille_aux_2 : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (taille_0 ls) <= taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)
taille_aux_0 : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (taille_0 la) <= taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)
taille_aux_1 : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), 1 <= taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)
conservation_5_0 : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), 1 <= taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_list_disj : forall l : term_list, l = tnil \/ (exists (hd : term) (tl : term_list), l = tcons hd tl)
conservation_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), 1 <= essence_list tnil d p
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
conservation_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (l : term_list), 1 <= essence_list l d prec_empty
high_aux_3 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high t <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
high_aux_4 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high_0 tl <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
borne_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), prec_in_dta d p -> taille_0 p <= DTA_taille d
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end...
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end...
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d
term_occur_0_1 = fun (u : term) (H : term_list_occur u tnil) => term_ind (fun u0 : term => term_list_occur u0 tnil -> term_high u0 <= term_high_0 tnil) (fun (a : ad) (t : term_list) (H0 : term_list_occur (app a t) tnil) => let H1 : app a t = app a t -> tnil = tnil -> term_high (app a t) <= term_high_0 tnil := match H0 in (term_list_occur t0 t1) return (t0 = app a t -> t1 = tnil -> term_high (app a t) <= term_high_0 tnil) with | tlo_head t0 hd tl H1 => fun (H2 : t0 = app a t) (H3 : tcons hd tl = tnil) => (fun H4 : t0 = app a t => let H5 : t0 = app...
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a

```coq
intros d hd tl a la ls.
simpl.
rewrite <- conservation_3.
apply le_trans with (essence_list (tcons hd tl) d ls).
apply conservation_4.
rewrite <- taille_aux_2.
apply le_trans with (taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)).
apply taille_aux_1.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros d hd tl a la ls. simpl. rewrite <- conservation_3. apply le_trans with (essence_list (tcons hd tl) d ls). apply conservation_4. rewrite <- taille_aux_2. apply le_trans with (taille_0 (prec_cons a la ls)). apply taille_aux_1. auto.
